attributes.action: Stop access and participation in pornography for minors
attributes.additional_details: It is revealed that the average age of first exposure to pornographic material is now 12, with the accessibility and legality of such actions made possible due to the internet porn sites. Now many teen girls give oral sex before even giving a first kiss due to the expectations of their male counterparts, expectations sought through their porn fuelled fantasies. The government need to act to stop children being corrupted due to their lack of regulation over illegal material.
attributes.background: For all sites with the capability to publish pornographic material to require ID proof of age, and be regulated to block all underage participation in pornography to make it a wholly over 18 industry.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Make showing proof of age a legal requirement for accessing online pornography:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580004
